info.title: ACE AI API
info.description: API for authentication, synthetic data generation, and generative AI tasks.

post.description: Creates a new user account. Requires username, password, role, org, github, and linkedin.

400.description: Invalid request or username already exists.

post.description: Authenticates a user by username and password. Returns a session token in an HttpOnly cookie.

401.description: Unauthorized - credentials did not match any user.

patch.description: Updates a user's profile with expertise, bio, education, and experiences.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the profile to update.

post.summary: Obtain a signed URL to upload dataset
post.description: Returns a signed URL that allows authorized clients to upload a dataset to a secure storage bucket.

requestBody.description: Username and filename for the dataset to be uploaded.

401.description: Unauthorized - missing or invalid Bearer token.

post.summary: Obtain a signed URL to download dataset
post.description: Returns a signed URL that allows authorized clients to download a previously uploaded or generated synthetic dataset.

requestBody.description: Username and filename for the dataset to be downloaded.

401.description: Unauthorized - missing or invalid Bearer token.

post.description: Creates a request for generating a new synthetic dataset based on an existing dataset. Typically triggers a background process or an agent to generate data.

requestBody.description: Information needed for generating synthetic data (omitted in the current example).

200.description: Synthetic data generation request successfully created.

401.description: Unauthorized - missing or invalid Bearer token.

post.summary: Obtain a signed URL to upload dataset (GenAI)
post.description: Returns a signed URL that allows authorized clients to upload data for Generative AI tasks.

requestBody.description: Username and filename for the dataset to be uploaded for GenAI.

401.description: Unauthorized - missing or invalid Bearer token.

post.summary: Obtain a signed URL to download dataset (GenAI)
post.description: Returns a signed URL that allows authorized clients to download data used or generated by Generative AI tasks.

requestBody.description: Username and filename for the dataset to be downloaded for GenAI.

401.description: Unauthorized - missing or invalid Bearer token.

post.summary: Sends a custom prompt to perform a specific task using GenAI capabilities
post.description: Provides an AI-based analysis, evaluation, or inference on the uploaded dataset by sending a custom prompt. May be used to run model inference or other tasks on the dataset.

requestBody.description: Evaluation parameters, specifically the prompt used to instruct the model or AI system.

401.description: Unauthorized - missing or invalid Bearer token.

get.description: Fetches a random task based on the provided query parameter 'task-type'. Currently supports 'ellipsis-tier2-task'.

400.description: Bad request â€“ e.g. task-type parameter missing or invalid.

post.description: Creates a new task of the specified type. Currently supports 'ellipsis-tier2-task'.

parameters.name: taskType
parameters.description: The type of task to create (e.g. 'ellipsis-tier2-task').

requestBody.description: Payload containing the details of the task to create.

patch.description: Updates fields of an existing task identified by its task type and id.

parameters.name: taskType
parameters.description: The type of task to update (e.g. 'ellipsis-tier2-task').

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the task.

requestBody.description: Payload containing the fields to update.

get.description: Fetch evaluation data filtered by username, status, limit, offset, and expertise.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Filter evaluation data by evaluator username.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: expertise
parameters.description: Expertise values to filter evaluation data.

post.description: Creates a new evaluation data entry.

get.summary: Retrieve a random evaluation data entry
get.description: Returns a random evaluation data entry based on the evaluator's username.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Evaluator's username used to fetch a random evaluation data entry.

patch.description: Updates evaluation data fields such as tags, status, data, and rating.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the evaluation data entry.

requestBody.description: Fields to update in the evaluation data entry.

get.description: Fetches comments for a given evaluation data entry using the query parameter evalDataId.

parameters.name: evalDataId
parameters.description: Identifier of the evaluation data entry for which to retrieve comments.

post.summary: Add a comment to evaluation data
post.description: Creates a new comment for an evaluation data entry.

patch.description: Updates a comment associated with an evaluation data entry. The commenter in the request body must match the original commenter.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the comment to update.

delete.description: Deletes a comment associated with an evaluation data entry.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the comment to delete.

response.description: A confirmation message for successful authentication.

filename.description: The name of the file to be uploaded or downloaded.

signed_url.description: A time-limited URL for uploading or downloading data.

SyntheticGenerateRequest.description: Request payload for generating synthetic data. (Currently no specific fields are enforced.)

gen_dataset_id.description: Unique identifier assigned to the newly generated synthetic dataset.

status.description: Current status of the generation request (e.g., 'in-progress', 'complete').

prompt.description: Custom textual prompt or instructions for evaluating or analyzing the dataset.

results.description: The AI's response or evaluation result for the given prompt.

error.description: Error code or HTTP status code.

role.description: The role for the new user.

org.description: The organization for the new user.

github.description: The GitHub username for the new user.

linkedin.description: The LinkedIn profile for the new user.

response.description: A confirmation message for successful sign up.

AuthProfilePatchRequest.description: Request body for updating a user profile.

response.description: A confirmation message for successful profile update.

EditorTaskPostRequest.description: Request payload for creating a new ellipsis tier 2 task.

as_of_date.description: Date as of which the task is valid.

expected_answer.description: The expected answer for the task.

EditorTaskPostResponse.description: Response after creating a new task.

result.description: A confirmation message including details such as rows affected or the inserted id.

EditorTaskPatchRequest.description: Request payload for updating an existing ellipsis tier 2 task.

result.description: A confirmation message including details such as rows affected.

EvaluationData.description: Details of an evaluation data entry.

EvaluationDataPostRequest.description: Request payload for creating a new evaluation data entry.

EvaluationDataPostResponse.description: Response after creating a new evaluation data entry.

result.description: A confirmation message for successful creation.

EvaluationDataPatchRequest.description: Request payload for updating an evaluation data entry.

EvaluationDataPatchResponse.description: Response after updating an evaluation data entry.

result.description: A confirmation message for successful update.

EvaluationComment.description: Details of an evaluation data comment.

EvaluationCommentPostRequest.description: Request payload for posting a new comment on evaluation data.

EvaluationCommentPostResponse.description: Response after posting a new comment.

result.description: A confirmation message for successful comment creation.

EvaluationCommentPatchRequest.description: Request payload for updating an evaluation data comment.

EvaluationCommentPatchResponse.description: Response after updating an evaluation data comment.

result.description: A confirmation message for successful comment update.

EvaluationCommentDeleteResponse.description: Response after deleting an evaluation data comment.

result.description: A confirmation message for successful comment deletion.
